content.prompt: Darwin's perspective in the first paragraph regarding future developments is significant because of its

choices.label: speculative nature, which was not common among scientific thinkers of his period
essentially positivist view of human progress, which broke with Enlightenment tradition
adaptation by racial thinkers, who used it to justify European imperialist policies
pessimistic view of development, which anticipated the cultural relativism that began to develop in the late nineteenth century

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Explain the significance of a source's point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience, including how these might limit the use(s) of a source.
